data.comment: The match is underway in Sheffield.
The first-half has come to a close in Sheffield.
In the minute 46, The second-half has started.
Sheffield Wed make their first substitution with Isaiah Brown replacing Joey Pelupessy.
Joost van Aken (Sheffield Wed) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
In the minute 66, Connor Mahoney is replacing Jed Wallace for Millwall at Hillsborough Stadium.
Garry Monk is making the team's second substitution at Hillsborough Stadium with Callum Paterson replacing Elias Kachunga.
The home team have replaced Joost van Aken with Jack Marriott. This is the third substitution made today by Garry Monk.
In the minute 80, Jon Dadi BÃ¶dvarsson is replacing Mason Bennett for the away team.
Tom Bradshaw is on a sub for Matt Smith for Millwall.
It's 0-0 as the referee blows for full-time.
Isaiah Brown for Sheffield Wed has been booked by Tony Harrington and receives a first yellow card.
